name: Fruit Siege
description:
Although, at first glance, it can not be easily concluded, this game was inspired by the idea of fighting for a healthy diet.

In fact, in this game a band of fruits are fighting against pots and pans, which are considered enemies of the natural food.

With the help of a catapult and fruits(apples, strawberries, oranges, etc.), which serve as ammunition, players try to hit and break all the pots and pans that are in front of them, because it is a requirement to move to the next level.

The ultimate goal of the game is to break free other fruits, which are captured by the hungry pots and pans.

Thanks to the scenery and the sounds that accompany the game, player gets the impression that he is in a natural environment.

In the vast expanse of meadows, forests and mountains, the chirping of birds, stream and the wind, you are fighting for domination of nature and the destruction of unnatural. Complete atmosphere of the game gives the impression of serenity and optimism.

This game can be a great check of your knowledge of the physical laws on leverage and torque. If you are not well-versed in this area, this is the opportunity to learn something new through playing, which will definitely use you in the real world.
